items.catalyzed_reaction: Reduction of aldehydes and ketones; oxidation of alcohols.
items.name: Alcohol Dehydrogenase from Ralstonia sp. (RADH)
items.purification_method: Size exclusion chromatography (SEC) and anion exchange chromatography in TEA–HCl buffer, pH 7.5.
items.special_treatment: Stability increased with CaCl2 addition (0.2 and 0.8 mmol L-1).
